title: Blended Learning Foundational Competency Course for Online Music Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. A music education-based team-building program to strengthen leadership within organizations

learning_goals: Learners can generate simple rhythm patterns using smartphone-based digital music production tools.
Learners can explain three principles of music education design by analyzing video lectures within an LMS.
Learners can revise online music learning materials using a peer feedback system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
